#summary get start with EvolView

== get start with EvolView ==

The "app" page consists mainly six components:

    https://img.skitch.com/20111209-cuft3734nf1knmqy8ykewcrqx4.png

  # a header bar. Several widgets are included, including 
    * a "account setting" button; for registered users only
    * a "Logout" button.
  # a logo (may be changed over time)
  # a browser panel. Projects and tress for current user will be shown here. Datasets of activated trees will be also shown.
  # a disclosure panel. Click it to hide/ show the logo and the browser panel (to maximize the canvas area (6)).
  # a tool bar.
  # a canvas to display the active tree.
